text: Lauren Louise Dolan (born 19 September 1999) is a British professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's Continental Team . In September 2017, Dolan crashed heavily during the junior time trial event at the 2017 UCI Road World Championships, but went on to finish the race. ==Major results== ;2019 : 3rd 15px Mixed team relay, UCI Road World Championships ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:English female cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Exeter
title: Lauren Dolan
